com.percussion.publisher.client
Class PSDatabasePublisherHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.publisher.client.PSDatabasePublisherHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSPublisher
public class PSDatabasePublisherHandler
extends Object
implements IPSPublisher

This publisher plugin publishes to the database specified in content item delivered as documents conforming to the sys_DatabasePublisher.dtd.

This class is not used after release 6.5.2. However, this class has been modified after 6.5.2 and claimed has fixed a bug "that would cause the connection pool to not work correctly". Leave this code around in case a custom implementation derived from this class is used after release 6.5.2 (in conjunction with com.percussion.rx.delivery.impl.PSWrapperDeliveryHandler.

Method Detail

init

public void init(IPSContentPublisherContext publisherContext)
Description copied from interface: IPSPublisher
Method called by the engine during initialization. This is called only once in the plugin object's lifetime. Typically used to perform any initialization before publishing.

Note that the publishing plugin is initialized before use, but after IPSPublisher.getDeliveryTypes() is called.

Specified by:
init in interface IPSPublisher
Parameters:
publisherContext - that has variety of information that may be required for plugin's initialization.

terminate

public void terminate()
Description copied from interface: IPSPublisher
Method called by the engine just before the plugin object loses its scope. This is called only once in the plugin object's lifetime. Typically used to perform any cleanup.

Specified by:
terminate in interface IPSPublisher

needsContentForUnpublishing

public boolean needsContentForUnpublishing()
Description copied from interface: IPSPublisher
By implementing this method users can tell publisher engine to supply either assembled content or null as InputStream parameter to unpublish method. The unpublish method requires assembled content to unpublish the item in some cases (Database publishing) and not in some other cases (File, FTP). Implementor has to return false if the content is not required while unpublishing and true if it is required.

Specified by:
needsContentForUnpublishing in interface IPSPublisher
Returns:
true or false based on content requirement in unpublishing.

getDeliveryTypes

public Collection getDeliveryTypes()
Description copied from interface: IPSPublisher
Get method that returns the collection of delivery type strings the publisher implements.This collection is used to make sure the registered delivery type (specified in the properties file matches with one of this.

This method is used before the plugin is officially initialized and therefore cannot rely on initialization for the returned data.

Specified by:
getDeliveryTypes in interface IPSPublisher
Returns:
Collection deliveryTypes never null or empty, each element is of type String.

publish

public int publish(IPSContentItemContext context,
                   InputStream in)
            throws PSPublisherPluginException
Description copied from interface: IPSPublisher
This actually does the publishing. It just returns the action type. Refer to the interface IPSPublisher for action types.

Specified by:
publish in interface IPSPublisher
Parameters:
context - Content Item Context contains item level information useful for publishing, never null.
in - source content for publishing, never null.
Returns:
one of the constants defined in this interface to indicate the status of publishing of the content item.
Throws:
PSPublisherPluginException - when publishing fails for a serious reason and publishing process can not continue.

unpublish

public int unpublish(IPSContentItemContext context,
                     InputStream in)
              throws PSPublisherPluginException
Description copied from interface: IPSPublisher
This actually does the unpublishing. This does not throw exception in case failure since the information is not logged anyway. It just returns the action type. Refer to the interface IPSPublisher for action types.

Specified by:
unpublish in interface IPSPublisher
Parameters:
context - Content Item Context contains item level information useful for unpublishing, never null.
in - source content for unpublishing, may be null for example, unpublishing a file does not need the content to unpublish.
Returns:
one of the constants defined in this interface to indicate the status of unpublishing of the content item.
Throws:
PSPublisherPluginException - when publishing fails for a serious reason and unpublishing process can not continue.
